We use confluence, but not to track test results.  We just run the
tests in=
 Team City and generate reports.  Any build artefacts
(including test repor=
ts) are published by Team City at known URLs for
last commit, last good bui=
ld, etc.  We link from Confluence to the
test reports.

--Nat.

natpryce.com
